alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 10:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana and northern Pearl River Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1058 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Poplarville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poplarville. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 31 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
